item.title: How To Setup a PPTP VPN in Ubuntu Server ?
item.description: VPN secures your computer’s internet connection to guarantee that all of the data you’re sending and receiving is encrypted and secured from prying eyes. You can get cheap vpn from many vpn providers. But i will show you how to get a private VPN maintained by yourself by less then 4$.
